item.title: Gang will target Minuteman vigil on Mexico border
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Members of a violent Central America-based gang have been sent to Arizona to target Minuteman Project volunteers, who will begin a monthlong border vigil this weekend to find and report foreigner sneaking into the United States, project officials say. (Link courtesy of Wonkette)
